name: Chipolo
0:
”Alexa, ask Chipolo to ring my phone”
”Alexa, ask Chipolo to ring my keys”
”Alexa, ask Chipolo where I left my wallet”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chipolo
des:
Chipolo is a simple device that connects your belongings (like keys, wallet, backpack) to the Chipolo app on your phone and helps you find them. It has an easy-to-use app and is available for iOS and Android devices. Alexa Skill is compatible with all Chipolo models.

How to connect your Alexa Skill to Chipolos?

- Buy Chipolos at www.chipolo.net
- Attach Chipolo to anything you don't want to lose
- Download the app and create an account
- Connect Chipolo to the Chipolo app
- Enable the Alexa Skill and link your account

Once connected, you can ask Alexa to find your phone, your keys or any other belonging you attached Chipolo to.

How to use the Chipolo skill for Amazon Alexa?

- "Alexa, ask Chipolo to find my phone"
- "Alexa, ask Chipolo to find my keys"
- "Alexa, ask Chipolo to ring my wallet"
- "Alexa, ask Chipolo to ping my suitcase"
- "Alexa, ask Chipolo to start ringing my backpack"

- "Alexa, ask Chipolo where my backpack is"
- "Alexa, ask Chipolo where I left my passport"
- "Alexa, ask Chipolo to tell me where my bike is"
- "Alexa, ask Chipolo about the location of my wallet"
